content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Rahman. I'm sure you will find it a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the price. What would you consider a fair rent for the space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I'm a student, so I'm looking for a place that is both affordable and meets my needs. The apartment seems to be in a good location and is well-maintained. I'm interested in paying a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to negotiate the rent?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Mr. Rahman, as a landlord, I am always open to reasonable negotiations. I understand that you are a student, and I will take that into consideration. What would you suggest as a fair monthly rent for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I believe a fair monthly rent for the apartment, considering its size and the utilities included, would be around 800 Euros. This is a price that I believe reflects the value of the apartment and is within my budget as a student. Would you be willing to accept this amount?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Mr. Rahman, your offer of 800 Euros is quite close to my asking price. Considering your status as a student and the fact that you are a potential long-term tenant, I am willing to accept your offer. I believe it is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Please confirm if you agree to rent the apartment at 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
